parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per finding, per object, per time point, per visit per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FASEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: FASEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: FAGRPID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FASPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: FASPID

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FATESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in FATEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in FATESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). FATESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores.
datasetVariables.label: Findings About Test Short Name
datasetVariables.name: FATESTCD

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FATEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the test or examination used to obtain the measurement or finding. The value in FATEST cannot be longer than 40 characters.
datasetVariables.label: Findings About Test Name
datasetVariables.name: FATEST

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAOBJ

datasetVariables.description: Used to describe the object or focal point of the findings observation that is represented by --TEST. Examples: the term (such as Acne) describing a clinical sign or symptom that is being measured by a Severity test, or an event such as "VOMIT", where the volume of vomit is being measured by a volume test.
datasetVariables.label: Object of the Observation
datasetVariables.name: FAOBJ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FACAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of related records.
datasetVariables.label: Category for Findings About
datasetVariables.name: FACAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FASCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of FACAT.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Findings About
datasetVariables.name: FASCAT

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAORRES

self.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

datasetVariables.description: Result of the test as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding in Original Units
datasetVariables.name: FAORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAORRESU

datasetVariables.description: Original units in which the data were collected. The unit for FAORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Original Units
datasetVariables.name: FAORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FASTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from FAORRES in a standard format or standard units. FASTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in FASTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
datasetVariables.name: FASTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FASTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from FASTRESC. FASTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: FASTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FASTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for FASTRESC and FASTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: FASTRESU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FASTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate that the measurement was not done. Should be null if a result exists in FAORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: FASTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why a question was not answered. Used in conjunction with FASTAT when value is "NOT DONE".
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Performed
datasetVariables.name: FAREASND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C74456

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FALOC

datasetVariables.description: Used to specify the location of the clinical evaluation. Example: "EAR".
datasetVariables.label: Location of the Finding About
datasetVariables.name: FALOC

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99073

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FALAT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for anatomical location or specimen further detailing laterality. Examples: "RIGHT", "LEFT", "BILATERAL".
datasetVariables.label: Laterality
datasetVariables.name: FALAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FABLFL

datasetVariables.description: Indicator used to identify a baseline value. The value should be "Y" or null. Note that FABLFL is retained for backward compatibility. The authoritative baseline flag for statistical analysis is in an ADaM dataset.
datasetVariables.label: Baseline Flag
datasetVariables.name: FABLFL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Used only for results that are subjective (e.g., assigned by a person or a group). Should be null for records that contain collected or derived data. Examples: "INVESTIGATOR", "ADJUDICATION COMMITTEE", "VENDOR".
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: FAEVAL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FADTC

datasetVariables.description: Collection date and time of findings assessment represented in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Collection
datasetVariables.name: FADTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FADY

datasetVariables.description:
Study day of collection, measured as integer days. 
 Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics. This formula should be consistent across the submission.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Collection
datasetVariables.name: FADY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FANOMDY

datasetVariables.description: Nominal study day used for grouping records for observations that may occur on different days into a single reported study day. Should be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Nominal Study Day for Tabulations
datasetVariables.name: FANOMDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FANOMLBL

datasetVariables.description: A label for a given value of FANOMDY as presented in the study report. Examples: "Week 4", "Day 28".
datasetVariables.label: Label for Nominal Study Day
datasetVariables.name: FANOMLBL

modelClassVariable.title: Day of Obs Relative to Exposure

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAXDY

self.title: Day of Obs Relative to Exposure

datasetVariables.description: The actual study day of a finding about an intervention or event derived relative to the first exposure to any protocol-specified treatment. Derived relative to the RFXSTDTC in Demographics. Expressed in integer days relative to the RFXSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Day of Obs Relative to Exposure
datasetVariables.name: FAXDY

modelClassVariable.title: Start Day of Obs Relative to Exposure

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAXSTDY

self.title: Start Day of Obs Relative to Exposure

datasetVariables.description: The actual study day of the start of a finding about an intervention or event, derived relative to the first exposure to any protocol-specified treatment. Derived relative to the RFXSTDTC in Demographics. Expressed in integer days relative to the RFXSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Start Day of Obs Relative to Exposure
datasetVariables.name: FAXSTDY

modelClassVariable.title: End Day of Obs Relative to Exposure

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FAXENDY

self.title: End Day of Obs Relative to Exposure

datasetVariables.description: The actual study day of the end of a finding about an intervention or event derived relative to the first exposure to any protocol-specified treatment. Derived relative to the RFXSTDTC in Demographics. Expressed in integer days relative to the RFXSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: End Day of Obs Relative to Exposure
datasetVariables.name: FAXENDY

modelClassVariable.title: Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FACHDY

self.title: Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent

datasetVariables.description: The actual study day of a finding about an intervention or event derived relative to the first exposure to the challenge agent that induces the disease or condition that the investigational treatment is intended to cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent. Derived relative to the RFCSTDTC in Demographics. Expressed in integer days relative to the RFCSTDTC in Demographics. Not to be used with human clinical trials.
datasetVariables.label: Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent
datasetVariables.name: FACHDY

modelClassVariable.title: Start Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FACHSTDY

self.title: Start Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent

datasetVariables.description: The actual study day of the start of a finding about an intervention or event derived relative to the first exposure to the challenge agent that induces the disease or condition that the investigational treatment is intended to cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent. Derived relative to the RFCSTDTC in Demographics. Expressed in integer days relative to the RFCSTDTC in Demographics. Not to be used with human clinical trials.
datasetVariables.label: Start Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent
datasetVariables.name: FACHSTDY

modelClassVariable.title: End Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Animal Rule Version 1.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable FA.FACHENDY

self.title: End Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent

datasetVariables.description: The actual study day of the end of a finding about an intervention or event derived relative to the first exposure to the challenge agent that induces the disease or condition that the investigational treatment is intended to cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent. Derived relative to the RFCSTDTC in Demographics. Expressed in integer days relative to the RFCSTDTC in Demographics. Not to be used with human clinical trials.
datasetVariables.label: End Day of Obs Rel to Challenge Agent
datasetVariables.name: FACHENDY

label: Findings About Events or Interventions
